summary: This bill, the "Protecting the Right to Keep and Bear Arms Act of 2025," aims to prevent the President and the Secretary of Health and Human Services from using emergency declarations to impose gun control measures. It specifically prohibits them from using the National Emergencies Act, the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act, and section 319 of the Public Health Service Act for this purpose. The bill also amends the Stafford Act to further restrict firearm regulations during declared emergencies.
